name: Butterflies (Wolfram9)
description:
The goal of the game is to catch as many butterflies as you can, but you have to do it in the specific order, that is shown by the indicator placed bottom of the screen. 

NOTICE:

PC and Android versions are the same content as WebGl version of the game, but they don't require internet connection, and have better optimization depending on the platform.    

CONTROLS:

left mouse button  to interact

tap on mobile devices and touchscreens

WARNING:

After some time game makes you sleepy :)
